Package com.reversi.common

package com.reversi.common
  • Class
    Description
    Board
    The Board class models an 8x8 board for the game of Reversi.
    Board.BoardDeserializer
     
    Board.BoardSerializer
     
    Event
     
    EventBus
    A simple generic event bus for registering and dispatching events.
    EventListener<T extends Event>
    The generic listener interface for events.
    FischerClock
    A clock implementation based on the Fischer time control mechanism.
    FischerClock.FischerClockDeserializer
    Custom Jackson deserializer for FischerClock.
    FischerClock.FischerClockSerializer
    Custom Jackson serializer for FischerClock.
    FischerClock.NoOpTicker
    A no-operation ticker implementation.
    ITicker
     
    JacksonObjMapper

    Message.Type
     
    Player
     
    PlayerStatus
    Captures the state of a player inside a LobbyRoom, including whether they are ready and what role they have.
    ReversiGame
    ReversiGame encapsulates the core logic of a Reversi game including board state management, move validation, disc flipping, and player turn management.
    ReversiGame.Deserializer
    Deserializer handles custom JSON deserialization for ReversiGame.
    ReversiGame.Serializer
    Serializer provides a custom JSON serialization for ReversiGame.
    Ticker
